item.title: HE.NET Domain Outage
item.description: A few days ago, it was Independence Day in the United States, and many businesses took the day off. However, on this very day, the domain name of major Internet Service Provider Hurricane Electric (HE, AS6939), HE.NET was suspended. This incident sparked significant discussion on the North American Network Operators’ Group (NANOG) Mailing List. The Incident On July 4, 2024, HE.NET was entirely suspended. The reason for this was that their domain registrar, Network Solutions, placed the domain in “Client Hold” status.
